DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effects of Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation (PNF) patterns delivered to the upper limb, lower limb and trunk for promoting motor irradiation to the contralateral lower limb.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of the Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation for Promoting Muscular Irradiation
DOC.criteria: righthanded sedentary healthy body mass index between 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 having any injuries that prevented the implementation of the proposed activities being pregnant
